name: Total Fury
description:
Hardcore fast-paced action!

 You stop moving - you die. Inspired by Doom Eternal on Nightmare.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: SLASH

Right Mouse Button: DASH

E: Consume FURY to HEAL

My team:
  • Code, Music, Art, Game Design, Sound Design, Being on the verge of insanity: Zezed
  • Motivational chocolate cake and cuddles: Gf.
  • Reigniting my love for this existence: Frog's Theme playing at the Olympics.

Peace and patience,

Zezed.

This project was made for Tom Hall's RNDGAMEJAM II.
This is my first game, too...
Random title generated from: https://imgur.com/a/zGF9WoF
